name: Frenzied
text: Cost reduced.

text: Your hero has +2 Attack this turn.

name: Desk Imp
flavor: "I feel inky!"

name: Abyssal Destroyer
text: Taunt

name: Battlefiend
text: After your hero attacks, gain +1 Attack.
flavor: Say what you like about my hatchet-headed hooligan, he’s my battle-friend.

name: Blood Imp
text: [x] Stealth. At the end of your \nturn, give another random\n friendly minion +1 Health.
flavor: Imps are content to hide and viciously taunt everyone nearby.

name: Fiendish Servant
text: [x]Deathrattle: Give this\nminion's Attack to a random\nfriendly minion twice.

name: Fiendish Servant
text: [x]Deathrattle: Give this\nminion's Attack to a random\nfriendly minion.
flavor: Putting the "r" in fiend.

name: Flame Imp
text: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to your hero.
flavor: Imps like being on fire.  They just do.

name: Icky Imp
text: Deathrattle: Resummon this minion and Illhoof loses 2 Health.

name: Icky Imp
text: Deathrattle: Resummon this minion and Illhoof loses 2 Health.

name: Impcaster
text: Spell Damage +1

name: Imprisoned Gan'arg
text: Dormant for 2 turns.\nWhen this awakens,\nequip a 3/2 Axe.
flavor: Factory Direct Fiery War Axe. Please allow two turns for delivery.

name: Imprisoned Homunculus
text: Dormant for 2 turns.\nTaunt
flavor: He got a time out for excessive vulgarity.

name: Kolek
text: Your other minions have +1 Attack.

name: Malchezaar's Imp
text: Whenever you discard a card, draw a card.
flavor: Malchezaar used to have an imp named Dobby working for him, but there was a tragic accident.

howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Spire, in One Night in Karazhan.

name: Reffuh
text: Charge

name: Shadowhoof Slayer
text: Battlecry: Give your hero +1_Attack this turn.
flavor: Was a humble Elven Archer before Sargeras got to him.

name: Shima
text: Taunt

name: Soulfed Felhound
text: Taunt

name: Spirit Jailer
text: Battlecry: Shuffle 2 Soul Fragments into your deck.
flavor: "Sure, they're in your deck, but the mind is like, the REAL prison."

name: Ur'zul Horror
text: Deathrattle: Add a 2/1 Lost Soul to your hand.
flavor: You face face face face face Jaraxxus!

name: Voidwalker
text: Taunt
flavor: No relation to "The Voidsteppers", the popular Void-based dance troupe.

name: Voidwalker
text: Taunt

name: Witchwood Imp
text: [x]Stealth\nDeathrattle: Give a random\n friendly minion +2 Health.
flavor: This wood imp. Stop asking!

name: Worthless Imp
text: You are out of demons! At least there are always imps...

name: Darkglare
text: After your hero takes damage, refresh a Mana_Crystal.
flavor: He's got a dark glare, but he sees crystal clear!

name: Felhound
text: Rush

name: Felhound
text: Rush

name: Felstalker
text: Battlecry: Discard a random card.
flavor: This puppy chews up cards instead of shoes.

name: Imprisoned Felmaw
text: [x]Dormant for 2 turns.\nWhen this awakens,\n__attack a random enemy.
flavor: It doesn't care who woke it up, someone's getting bitten.

name: Imprisoned Scrap Imp
text: Dormant for 2 turns.\nWhen this awakens,\ngive all minions in your hand +2/+1.
flavor: His impish imports imply impressively impetuous impropriety.

name: Imprisoned Vilefiend
text: Dormant for 2 turns.\nRush
flavor: If you do the time, you gotta make up the time.

name: Mo'arg Artificer
text: All minions take double damage from spells.
flavor: Double-damage. You know the drill.

name: Queen of Pain
text: Lifesteal
flavor: Her sister is the Queen of Pane who sells windows and shower doors.

name: Rusted Voidwalker
text: Taunt. At the start of your turn, restore 2 health to this minion.

name: Sightless Watcher
text: Battlecry: Look at 3 cards in your deck. Choose one to put on top.
flavor: What he lacks in sight, he makes up for in sleight-of-tentacle tricks.

name: Tiny Knight of Evil
text: Whenever you discard a card, gain +1/+1.
flavor: "No, no, no. I asked for a tiny JESTER of evil."

name: Vilefiend
text: Lifesteal
flavor: Dreamed of becoming a Stylefiend, but fel was never in season.

name: Void Analyst
text: Deathrattle: Give all Demons in your hand +1/+1.
flavor: Conclusion: Nothing there.

name: Vulgar Homunculus
text: Taunt\nBattlecry: Deal 2 damage to your hero.
flavor: Fortunately he has an even number of fingers.

name: Vulgar Homunculus
text: Taunt\nBattlecry: Deal 2 damage to your hero.

name: Wrathguard
text: Whenever this minion takes damage, also deal that amount to your hero.
flavor: After playing against 5 Annoy-O-Trons, any normal guard will become a Wrathguard.

name: Chaos Gazer
text: [x]Battlecry: Corrupt a playable card in your opponent's hand. They have 1 turn to play it!
flavor: No matter the game rules, it's always playing Go Fish.

name: Doubling Imp
text: Battlecry: Summon a copy of this minion.
flavor: What's worse than finding two imps in your lab? Only finding one of them.

name: Felguard
text: Taunt\nBattlecry: Destroy one of your Mana Crystals.
flavor: Yes, he'll fight for you.  BUT HE'S NOT GOING TO LIKE IT.

name: Hell Bovine
text: Deathrattle: Place a copy of this card in your deck.

name: Hell Bovine
text: Deathrattle: Place a copy of this card in your deck.

name: Howlfiend
text: Whenever this minion takes damage, discard a_random card.
flavor: The problem is that he carries those cards in his mouth.

name: Imp Gang Boss
text: Whenever this minion takes damage, summon a 1/1 Imp.
flavor: His imp gang likes to sneak into Stormwind to spraypaint "Ragnaros Rulez" on the Mage Tower.
howToGet: Unlocked in Molten Core, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Molten Core, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

name: Imp Gang Boss
text: Whenever this minion takes damage, summon a 2/2 Imp.

name: Imp Gang Boss
text: Whenever this minion takes damage, summon a 1/1 Imp.
flavor: His imp gang likes to sneak into Stormwind to spraypaint "Ragnaros Rulez" on the Mage Tower.

name: Imprisoned Observer
text: Dormant for 2 turns. When this awakens, deal 2 damage to all enemy minions.
flavor: Currently serving two turns on charges of aggravated minion slaughter.

name: Imprisoned Satyr
text: [x]Dormant for 2 turns. When this awakens, reduce the Cost of a random minion in your hand by (5).
flavor: "C'mon down to Illhoof's bargain bin! When the satyr's free, he'll lower your fee!"

name: Imprisoner
text: Taunt\nDeathrattle: Summon a 2/2 Imp.

name: Imprisoner
text: Taunt\nDeathrattle: Summon a 1/1 Imp.

name: Nathrezim Overseer
text: Battlecry: Give a friendly Demon +2/+2.

name: Nathrezim Overseer
text: Battlecry: Give a friendly Demon +4/+4.

name: Nethersoul Buster
text: Battlecry: Gain +1 Attack for each damage your hero has taken this turn.
flavor: Why did the demon cross the streams? To get to The Other Side.

name: Satyr Overseer
text: After your hero attacks, summon a 2/2 Satyr.
flavor: What he lacks in communication skills, he makes up for with highly responsive staffing allocations.

name: Street Trickster
text: Spell Damage +1
flavor: His first trick: making your wallet disappear!

name: Terrorguard Escapee
text: Battlecry: Summon three 1/1 Huntresses for your_opponent.
flavor: Poor guy is terrified, look at his faces.

name: Unlicensed Apothecary
text: After you summon a minion, deal 5 damage to_your hero.
flavor: Get the ingredients wrong on ONE healing potion and they take your license. What a world!

name: Void Ripper
text: Battlecry: Swap the\nAttack and Health of all_other_minions.
flavor: You had to put the portable hole inside the bag of holding, didn't you?!

name: Void Terror
text: [x]Battlecry: Destroy both\nadjacent minions and gain\n their Attack and Health.
flavor: If you put this into your deck, you WILL lose the trust of your other minions.

name: Disguised Wanderer
text: Deathrattle: Summon a 9/1 Inquisitor.
flavor: He wanders east... always into the east.

name: Dreadsteed
text: Deathrattle: At the end\n of the turn, summon a Dreadsteed.
flavor: Crescendo himself summoned this steed, riding it to victory in the Grand Tournament.  Wherever he rides, an army of riders ride behind him, supporting the legendary champion.

name: Felsoul Inquisitor
text: Lifesteal\nTaunt
flavor: Everyone expects an inquisition reference.

name: Frenzied Felwing
text: Costs (1) less for each damage dealt to your opponent this turn.
flavor: Not to be confused with the "friendsy” felwing.

name: Hooked Reaver
text: Battlecry: If you have 15 or_less Health, gain +3/+3_and Taunt.
flavor: The hook is just an accessory. He can reave just fine without it.

name: Kil'rek
text: Taunt

name: Kil'rek
text: Taunt

name: Lakkari Felhound
text: Taunt\nBattlecry: Discard two random cards.
flavor: Guaranteed to track tar all over your carpet.

name: Magtheridon
text: [x]Dormant. Battlecry: Summon three 1/3 enemy Warders. When they die, destroy all minions and awaken.
flavor: Came from another world to invade Outland and bend it to his will… only to be overthrown by an elf from another world who invaded Outland and bent it to his will.

name: Nightshade Matron
text: Rush\nBattlecry: Discard your highest Cost card.
flavor: Throws shade at those "high-cost" minions.

name: Pit Lord
text: Battlecry: Deal 5 damage to your hero.
flavor: Mannoroth, Magtheridon, and Brutallus may be dead, but it turns out there are a LOT of pit lords.

name: Portal Keeper
text: [x]Battlecry: Shuffle 3 Portals into your deck. When drawn, summon a 2/2 Demon with Rush.
flavor: No longer allowed to be “it” when playing demon tag.

name: Rusted Legion Gan'arg
text: At the end of your turn, reduce the Cost of a random card in your hand by (3).

name: Sneaky Devil
text: Stealth\nYour other minions have +1 Attack.
flavor: The result of a tragic accident involving a Defias Thug, a Wand of Polymorph, and a bundle of Fel Lotus.

name: Timeshift: Dreadsteed
text: Deathrattle: Summon a Dreadsteed.

name: Voidcaller
text: Deathrattle: Put a random Demon from your hand into the battlefield.
flavor: "Void!  Here, void!  Here, buddy!"
howToGet: Unlocked in The Military Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in The Military Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

name: Witchwood Piper
text: [x]Battlecry: Draw the lowest\nCost minion from your deck.
flavor: She rids villages of annoying pests, like rats and children.

name: Desperate Dreadlord
text: Lifesteal

name: Despicable Dreadlord
text: At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to all enemy minions.
flavor: He's deathspicable.

name: Doomguard
text: Charge. Battlecry: Discard two random cards.
flavor: Summoning a doomguard is risky. Someone is going to die.

name: Floating Watcher
text: Whenever your hero takes damage on your turn, gain +2/+2.
flavor: "Evil Eye Watcher of Doom" was the original name, but marketing felt it was a bit too aggressive.

name: Floating Watcher
text: Whenever your hero takes damage on your turn, gain +4/+4.

name: Hell Bovine Champion
text: Deathrattle: Current turn player gains a random weapon.

name: Prince Malchezaar
text: [x]Start of Game:\nAdd 5 extra Legendary\nminions to your deck.
flavor: He was super excited to acquire Gorehowl at a garage sale!  Then super disappointed to find out it was a foam reproduction.
howToGet: Unlocked in the Spire, in One Night in Karazhan.
howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Spire, in One Night in Karazhan.

name: Void Drinker
text: [x]Taunt. Battlecry: Destroy\na Soul Fragment in your\ndeck to gain +3/+3.
flavor: It has no taste.

name: Wrathspike Brute
text: [x]Taunt After this is attacked, deal 1 damage to all enemies.
flavor: You scratch her back, her back scratches back.

name: Aranasi Broodmother
text: [x]Taunt\nWhen you draw this, restore\n#4 Health to your hero.
flavor: She's got a big brood and a big mood.

name: Christian Scharling
text: Battlecry: Rearrange \n your minions to be \n more effective.

name: Dread Infernal
text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to ALL other characters.
flavor: "INFERNOOOOOOOOOO!" - Jaraxxus, Eredar Lord of the Burning Legion

name: Imprisoned Antaen
text: [x]Dormant for 2 turns. When this awakens, deal 10 damage randomly split among all enemies.
flavor: Can I get a pair of size XXXXXL manacles?

name: Mad Summoner
text: [x]Battlecry: Fill each player's\nboard with 1/1 Imps.
flavor: Does he summon because of his madness, or is he mad from all the summoning?

name: Portal Overfiend
text: [x]Battlecry: Shuffle 3 Portals into your deck. When drawn, summon a 2/2 Demon with Rush.
flavor: It’s like an interdimensional game of demon tag.

name: Riftcleaver
text: Battlecry: Destroy a minion. Your hero takes damage equal to its Health.
flavor: Brings you face to face with your destructive impulses.

name: Rustsworn Champion
text: [x]Charge. Battlecry: Corrupt a_playable card in your opponent's hand. They have 1 turn to play it!

name: Scavenging Shivarra
text: Battlecry: Deal 6 damage randomly split among all_other minions.
flavor: Say what you want but finding a matching set of six swords takes commitment.

name: Void Crusher
text: Inspire: Destroy a random minion for each player.
flavor: We like to call him "Wesley".

name: Xavius
text: After you play a card, summon a 2/1 Satyr.
flavor: Xavius has grand nightmares of summoning Sargeras into this world, but a few Satyr will have to do for now.

name: Abyssal Enforcer
text: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to all other characters.
flavor: The Kabal print this on every package of illicit Mana Crystals: WARNING - DO NOT PUT WITHIN REACH OF ABYSSALS. THIS IS NOT APPROVED FOR USE BY FLAMING DEMONS OF ANY KIND.

name: Fearsome Doomguard
flavor: They were originally called Cuddleguards, but they were not inspiring the proper amount of fear.

name: Master Demonologist
text: Whenever you summon a Demon, gain +1/+1.

name: Master Demonologist
text: Whenever you summon a Demon, gain +2/+2.

name: Priestess of Fury
text: At the end of your turn, deal 6 damage randomly split among all enemies.
flavor: Furious that she only has six warglaives. The Sightless Watcher has eight! The fel is always greener on the other side.

name: Siegebreaker
text: Taunt\nYour other Demons have +2 Attack.

name: Siegebreaker
text: Taunt\nYour other Demons have +1 Attack.
flavor: Has a side hustle as a siegebroker.

name: Solarian Prime
text: Spell Damage +1\nBattlecry: Cast 5 random Mage spells (targets enemies if possible).

name: Annihilan Battlemaster
text: Battlecry: Gain +1 Health for each damage_your hero has taken.

name: Annihilan Battlemaster
text: Battlecry: Gain +2 Health for each damage_your hero has taken.

name: Enhanced Dreadlord
text: [x]Taunt\nDeathrattle: Summon a 5/5\nDreadlord with Lifesteal.
flavor: Photo actually taken across the street in the reflection of a doorknob.

name: Fel Lord Betrug
text: [x]Whenever you draw a minion, summon a copy with Rush that dies at end of turn.
flavor: Nobody else likes rush hour.

name: Hulking Overfiend
text: Rush. After this attacks and kills a minion, it may_attack again.
flavor: To hulk, perhaps, to fiend: ay, there's the rub.

name: Imp Mama
text: [x]Whenever this minion takes\ndamage, summon a random\nDemon and give it Taunt.

name: Imp Mama
text: [x]Whenever this minion takes damage, summon 2 random Demons and give them Taunt.

name: Kanrethad Prime
text: Battlecry: Summon 3 friendly Demons that died_this game.

name: Supreme Abyssal
text: Can't attack heroes.
flavor: Yet, you still feel attacked.

name: Ancient Void Hound
text: [x]At the end of your turn,\nsteal 1 Attack and Health\nfrom all enemy minions.
flavor: What happened to my 1/1 Void Pup? And the glee club?!

name: Krul the Unshackled
text: [x]Battlecry: If your deck has\nno duplicates, summon all\n_Demons from your hand._
flavor: Spicklefizz pondered his life choices as he looked at the chain around his neck. "Become a warlock," they said. "You get to enslave demons," they said.

name: Lord Jaraxxus
text: Battlecry: Destroy your hero and replace it with Lord Jaraxxus.
flavor: "TRIFLING GNOME! YOUR ARROGANCE WILL BE YOUR UNDOING!!!!"

name: Mal'Ganis
text: Your other Demons have +2/+2.\nYour hero is Immune.
flavor: Mal'Ganis doesn't like being betrayed, so if you discard him, watch out.

name: Mal'Ganis
text: Your other Demons have +4/+4.\nYour hero is Immune.

name: Pit Commander
text: Taunt\nAt the end of your turn, summon a Demon from your deck.
flavor: "Pit! Do as I say!"

name: Sathrovarr
text: Battlecry: Choose a friendly minion. Add a copy of it to_your hand, deck, and battlefield.
flavor: Just wait until you also find a copy in your pocket. And your desk! And your FRIDGE!!

name: Voidlord
text: [x]Taunt\n Deathrattle: Summon three\n2/6 Demons with Taunt.

name: Voidlord
text: [x]Taunt\n Deathrattle: Summon three\n1/3 Demons with Taunt.
flavor: Never let it hold your checkbook.

name: Azari, the Devourer
text: Battlecry: Destroy your opponent's deck.

name: Jumbo Imp
text: Costs (1) less whenever a friendly Demon dies while this is in your hand.
flavor: Jumbo in size! Huge in E.V.I.L.!
